text.section: A finding by the legislative body of a covered county about the qualification of an individual or family as a family of low or moderate income, or about any other matter connected with a program is conclusive in a suit, action, or proceeding that involves the validity or enforceability of a bond issued under this subtitle or the security for the bond.
